resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

The Apple phone number with which to send the SMS, in international format. Depends on your Android phone\'s carrier. AT&T phones use 28818773, many T-Mobile MVNOs use 28818773, etc. Find these in the iOS carrier bundle for your carrier (/System/Library/Carrier Bundles/[Your carrier]/carrier.plist and look for PhoneNumberRegistrationGatewayAddress)
Phone number of your iPhone, in international format
